name: General's Telephone
description:
GMTK game jam entry 2020, Theme: Out of Control.

Command a group of combat speeders to search and destroy enemy tanks, but be warned: the comm system is on the fritz and your orders will be received slowly and inaccuracy. 

Click on a unit to select it, then click to instruct where to go. The unit will go somewhere in the area indicated by the particles after a short delay to decode your orders. When a speeder encounters an enemy unit it will engage it in combat. The victor of the combat will emerge fully repaired and ready to fight again. Win by clearing all enemies from the map.

Created by: Miles - Code, Unity engine; and Riley - Modeling, Voice work
